mapper.select: SELECT A.BOOK_NO, B.BOOK_NAME, C.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, A.AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT B.BOOK_NO, SUM(B.COUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM BUY A JOIN BUY_BOOK B ON A.BUY_NO = B.BUY_NO WHERE A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY B.BOOK_NO ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC LIMIT 10 ) AS A JOIN BOOK B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN BOOK_IMAGES C ON B.BOOK_NO = C.BOOK_NO

SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER FROM BOOK A, BOOK_IMAGES B WHERE A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO AND BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY A.BOOK_NAME LIMIT 8;

SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, COUNT(C.USER_NO) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM BOOK A JOIN BOOK_IMAGES B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO LEFT JOIN USER_WISHLIST C ON A.BOOK_NO = C.BOOK_NO GROUP BY A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER ORDER BY WISHLIST_COUNT DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, A.BOOK_VIEW_COUNT FROM BOOK A JOIN BOOK_IMAGES B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO GROUP BY A.BOOK_NAME ORDER BY SUM(A.BOOK_VIEW_COUNT) DESC LIMIT 10;
